languages.text: "Знаешь, косматый, не тебе меня судить. Сам сколько в клетке сидел и не рыпался, а все туда же, бедную Идиру жизни поучать".
"You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"
languages.original_text: "Знаешь, косматый, не тебе меня судить. Сам сколько в клетке сидел и не рыпался, а все туда же, бедную Идиру жизни поучать".

traits.locale_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你还好意思说呢，大块头。你整天窝在笼子里，一动不动，你以为你配教训我？”
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"

traits.locale_text: “你还好意思说呢，大块头。你整天窝在笼子里，一动不动，你以为你配教训我？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ça vous va bien de dire ça, le géant... Vous osez me faire la leçon alors que vous avez vous-même passé des années en cage sans lever le petit doigt pour essayer d'en sortir ? »
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"

traits.locale_text: « Ça vous va bien de dire ça, le géant... Vous osez me faire la leçon alors que vous avez vous-même passé des années en cage sans lever le petit doigt pour essayer d'en sortir ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Mira quién habla, grandullón. Todo este tiempo enjaulado sin mover un dedo para salir, ¿y ahora te crees que puedes darme lecciones?».
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"

traits.locale_text: «Mira quién habla, grandullón. Todo este tiempo enjaulado sin mover un dedo para salir, ¿y ahora te crees que puedes darme lecciones?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あなただって同じでしょ、大男さん。ずーっとカゴにいて自力で出てこなかったじゃない。私に小言を言える立場かしら？」
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなただって同じでしょ、大男さん。ずーっとカゴにいて自力で出てこなかったじゃない。私に小言を言える立場かしら？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr müsst gerade reden, Großer. Ihr saßt die ganze Zeit in einem Käfig fest, habt keinen Finger gerührt, um Euch zu befreien, und wollt mir jetzt Vorträge halten?"
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst gerade reden, Großer. Ihr saßt die ganze Zeit in einem Käfig fest, habt keinen Finger gerührt, um Euch zu befreien, und wollt mir jetzt Vorträge halten?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"

languages.text: "Bunu diyen koca adama bakın. Bunca zamandır kafesteydin, kurtulmak için parmağını kıpırdatmadın ama bana ders verebileceğini mi sanıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, big man. You've been in a cage all this time and not lifted a finger to get yourself out of it, yet you think you can lecture me?"

traits.locale_text: "Söyleyen koca adama bakın. Bunca zamandır bir kafesteydin ve oradan kurtulmak için parmağını kıpırdatmadın ama bana ders verebileceğini mi sanıyorsun?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
